name: plutocratic

powerful because of being rich: Some say the world is ruled by a plutocratic elite. the plutocratic world of professional football See
plutocrat
More examplesFewer examplesThis is what a bloated, plutocratic capitalist looks like.A plutocratic society recognises no criteria of merit except wealth. The movement was unpopular because it was so transparently plutocratic.
